replies.bodyText:
Yes it could be done in UcteElement::fix, it is true. And the message should be more explicit.
But this method is supposed to fix the issue, not throw exception, but why not.
replies.author: murgeyseb

replies.bodyText: So maybe we can do the test in the constructor then?
